definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to develop/to evolve/to practice/to perform/to play/to act

sentences.english: We update sensitivities matrix by the quasi-Newton method after the first inversion.
sentences.chinese: 在第一次反演之后，采用拟牛顿法更新灵敏度矩阵。

sentences.english: An adaptive backstepping control method on electro-hydraulic loading simulator is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了电液负载模拟器的自适应反演控制策略。

sentences.english: This paper systematically studies the relationship between surface BRDF (Bidirectional Reflectance Distribution Function) retrieval and atmospheric correction.
sentences.chinese: 该文系统地研究了BRDF反演和大气纠正的关系。

sentences.english: The method of mapping inversion model is a classical method of analyzing complicate problems.
sentences.chinese: 映射反演模型方法是分析复杂问题的经典方法。

sentences.english: So it is feasible to discriminate gas-bearing reservoir by using prestack simultaneous inversion technique.
sentences.chinese: 因而，应用同步反演技术进行含气储层识别是可行的。

sentences.english: The paper presents a method for inversion of sound speed profile (SSP) in shallow-water environment.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种在浅水域进行声速剖面反演的方法。

sentences.english: It's still easy to crack a normal word, even if it's inversed.
sentences.chinese: 它还是容易破解一个正常的话，即使它的反演。

sentences.english: In a case study on the practical engineering, the elastic modulus and Poisson′s ratio are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 结合实际工程，反演了拱坝基岩的弹性模量和泊松比。

sentences.english: A new static correction using inverse modeling of first break is recommended here.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了初至波反演模拟实现静校正的新方法。

sentences.english: The typical model′s inversional results is coincided with true model′s.
sentences.chinese: 通过对典型模型的试算，反演结果与真实模型较吻合。

sentences.english: Much of Shavian drama is constructed around the inversion of a conventional theatrical situation.
sentences.chinese: 萧伯纳戏剧的大部分总是围绕着对传统剧情的反演。

sentences.english: Sectioned polynomial is a new method for gravity data inver- sion.
sentences.chinese: 逐段多项式法是一种新的反演重力资料的方法。

sentences.english: For this reason, the inversion of Q-value for weathered layer is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用面波来反演风化层的Q值。

sentences.english: In the phase space of the elastic parameter, the generalized linear inversion equations are presented.
sentences.chinese: 在弹性参数的相空间中，得到广义线性反演方程。

sentences.english: The extract of seismic wavelet is the base of wave impedance inversion and forward modeling.
sentences.chinese: 地震子波的提取是波阻抗反演及正演模拟的基础。

sentences.english: Seismic inversion problems must be solved by non linear global optimization methods.
sentences.chinese: 地震反演问题常常需要一些非线性全局最优化的方法。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
